name: nondepressed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not depressed (= unhappy and without hope), or not suffering from depression (= a mental illness in which a person is very unhappy and anxious for long periods and cannot have a normal life during these periods): Compared with children of nondepressed mothers, children of depressed mothers had higher levels of anxiety and social problems. Depressed and non-depressed children have been found to differ in their perceptions of self-worth. Don't forget that even non-depressed people get upset when bad or stressful things happen to them.
More examplesFewer examplesChildren of depressed mothers are six times more likely to develop depression than children of nondepressed mothers. Consistent and substantial differences were found between the depressed and nondepressed groups.
